title: pip install
body:
**确认已寻找过答案**

我已确认在 [Github issue](https://github.com/wzpan/wukong-robot/issues) 页、[常见问题](https://github.com/wzpan/wukong-robot/wiki/troubleshooting)页、[文档](http://wukong.hahack.com) 中都查找过，没有找到类似问题和资料。我也没有 google / bing/ 百度 / duckduckgo 到相关解答。

**安装方式**

手动安装

**操作系统**

Raspbian Buster


**问题描述**
我树莓派3上 使用 pip install -r requirements.txt 安装依赖的时候遇到这个问题 
Collecting greenlet
  Using cached https://www.piwheels.org/simple/greenlet/greenlet-0.4.15-cp37-cp37m-linux_armv7l.whl (47 kB)
ERROR: THESE PACKAGES DO NOT MATCH THE HASHES FROM THE REQUIREMENTS FILE. If you have updated the package versions, please update the hashes. Otherwise, examine the package contents carefully; someone may have tampered with them.
    gevent from https://www.piwheels.org/simple/gevent/gevent-1.4.0-cp37-cp37m-linux_armv7l.whl#sha256=11cc5eea3176c5bf0f37bff4b5abeb81777a6976b76cb59ec7882fa3b7ec6422 (from websocket==0.2.1->-r requirements.txt (line 12)):
        Expected sha256 11cc5eea3176c5bf0f37bff4b5abeb81777a6976b76cb59ec7882fa3b7ec6422
             Got        efd3efe7f06814a591a646148d5ebd27f1fe6a362188aa943680f2122417e265
尝试过的解决办法：
     sudo pip3 install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt 遇到了如下报错

socket.timeout: The read operation timed out
